titleStmt.title: SII 7.24: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 24. (A.R. No. 24 of 1900).

summary.p: ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE SAME MANDAPA.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . koṟcaṭapaṉmarāṉa tribhuvaṉaccakravat=tikaḷ śrīcuntarapāṇṭiyatevarkku yāṇṭu patiṉmuṉṟāvatu siṁhanāyaṟṟu pūrvvapakṣattu trayodaśiyum tiṅkaḷkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Uttirāṭattu nāḷ koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalattu vaṭapūvāṇiyanāṭṭu
tāramaṅkalattu mutalikaḷil kaṭuntarkkamutaliyum cāttarmutali Uṭaiyappaṉum cūriyatevar periyamutaliyum Āṉaikkuṭṭi cilampāṇṭaiyum Uṭaiyappaṉ Āṉaiyārum piḷḷaimutaliyār mutaliyum ciṟuUṭaiyāṉ mutaliyum melppaṭi Iḷamāṇṭaiyum I
vaṉaivom Ivvūr nīruṇi Iḷaiyāṉ nalluṭaiyappar taṅkaḷ mutaliyārperāl vaikkiṟa Akarappaṭṭarkaḷukku nāṅkaḷ Udakapūrvvadharmmadānapramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭutta paricāvatu Ivvūr kāraikuḷam Uṭaikuḷamāyp pāḻekiṭakkiṟa kuḷam Utaippukku muṉpe maṇa loḻukki kuḷamum Aṭai
ttu Ikkuḷattāl nir kāṭṭikoḷḷalām nilam tirutti Iṉṉilamum Ikkuḷattil nīrkovaiyum meṉokkiṉa maramum kiṇokkiṉa kiṇaṟum Uṭppaṭa Udakapūrvvadharmmadānamākak kuṭuttom Ivvakarattil bhaṭṭarkaḷukku Ivvaṉaivom Ippaṭi kuṭutta Innilam tāṉ veṇṭum Aṉaittu payirkaḷum ceytu⌈
koṇṭu veṇṭum phalavṛkṣaṅkaḷum vaittukkoṇṭu candrādityavaT cella bhūdāna Iṟaiyiliyāka Aṉubhavikkakaṭavarkaḷākavum Itu Ivarkaḷukku dānādhamanavikrayaṅkaḷukku Urittāvatākavum Ippaṭi cammatittu Udakapūrvvadharmmadānapramāṇam paṇṇikkuṭuttom Ivvakarappaṭṭarkaḷukku Ivvaṉaivom
Ippaṭikku Ivai ciṟuUṭaiyāṉmutali Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai piḷḷaimutaliyār makaṉ mutali Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku cāttarmutali Uṭaiyappaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku ciṟuUṭaiyāṉ Iḷamāṇṭai Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Āṉaiyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai Āṉaikkuṭṭi cilampāṇṭai Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku I⌈
vai kaṭuntarkka mutaliyār Eḻuttu Ippaṭikku Ivai periyamutaliyār kaiymāṭṭāṅkāṉamaikku tāramaṅkalattu taṭṭāṉ tirukkaivel Eḻuttu .
Digital edition of SII 7.24 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
